title: Design Architecture for RealTimeEventProcessingEngine
description: Create a high-level design of the system architecture that meets the performance requirements.

title: Develop High-Performance Event Handling Component
description: Design and implement a high-performance component that can handle millions of events per second with sub-millisecond latency. The component should be optimized for scalability, fault tolerance, and efficiency to ensure high throughput and low latency. This task requires a focus on data structures and algorithms suitable for large-scale event processing.

title: Develop UI for Monitoring and Management of RealTimeEventProcessingEngine
description: Create a user-friendly interface for monitoring and managing the engine's performance, event streams, and configuration settings. The UI should provide real-time analytics, customizable dashboards, an intuitive navigation system, and incorporate features such as error logging, alerts, and user permissions for secure access. Additionally, consider implementing features like session management, API integration, and a help/documentation section.

title: Implement Database Schema for Event Storage (Revised)
description: Design and implement an efficient database schema supporting fast retrieval of events for the RealTimeEventProcessingEngine. The schema should be optimized for sub-millisecond latency suitable for high-volume, real-time data processing. Include considerations for sharding, indexing, and transaction handling to ensure scalability and performance. Consider using a combination of in-memory databases for low-latency access and traditional databases for long-term storage and analytics. Address any potential security concerns such as data privacy and integrity.

title: Optimize Performance of RealTimeEventProcessingEngine
description: Perform profiling and optimization to ensure the engine can meet its performance requirements. Focus on improving event handling component and memory management.

title: Security Analysis and Vulnerability Assessment
description: Conduct a thorough security analysis of the system to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Create Technical Documentation for RealTimeEventProcessingEngine
description: Develop comprehensive technical documentation detailing the system architecture, component functionalities, and usage instructions. The document will serve as a guide for developers, testers, and other stakeholders.
